name: SPS10DS3
description:
"Space, the final frontier.":Narrator

Defend your cargo ship from pirates in space.

Play with your friend or go solo. Just remember keep the cargo ship live.

Made for Ludum Dare 46

If using keyboard. Use WASD and mouse. Connect controller to game by pressing face 1 button( xbox A,  switch B , PS X ,you get the point). Use  Left stick and D-pad to move. Right stick or movement direction to aim and shoulder buttons or face 1 and face 2 to do actions.
